title: Christmas pudding and cranberry sauce cheesecake
ingredients: ['For the base', '1 1/2 packets chocolate digestive biscuits', '250g Christmas pudding', '200g unsalted butter, melted', '100g brandy butter', 'For the filling', '6 (250g) tubs cream cheese', '4 tablespoons icing sugar', '200g cranberry sauce', '6 tablespoons brandy butter or cream', '50ml milk', '2 packets powdered gelatine', '80g chocolate, grated', '2 tablespoons cocoa powder']
